song.title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath
song.info:
SABBATH BLOODY SABBATH
by Black Sabbath Tracked by Malekith for the Modules In Black music disk in tribute of Black Sabbath. Arranged and transcribed by Malekith in January and February 2000. Guitar samples by Betrayer.
Actually I do not think this song is one of my best ones, since I had difficulties to get this "70's feeling" into the mod. Yet I didn't notice any big technical problem, here is the essential...
Contact me at : malekith@listen.to or by ICQ : 49731906 and don't forget to visit my website at :
http://listen.to/malekith
See you !
Malekith
